div.h2: Teaching for the Future, Honoring the Past

p.strong: School Board Meeting Budget Referendum on Monday April 27, 2020

span.p: There will beaBudget referendumSchool Board meeting onMonday April 27, 2020 at 5:00 PM. To attend the meeting click the link or dial the number below and enter the conference code.

a.title: Go to comments for School Board Meeting on Monday April 27, 2020

p.strong: Open WiFi Access for students and residents

span.p: Below is a list of open WiFi access for students in Highland County, Virginia.
Available in parking Lot area in front of school use HCPSGuest
Available in the parking lot area
Available in front street parking area
Available in parking area beside building
Available in parking area beside building
Available in parking area beside building
Available in parking area beside building

a.title: Go to comments for Open WiFi Access

span.p: Free access to online digital books is now available through the MyOn website. This is provided by the same company our Accelerated Reader program is through. Over 6500 books and current news articles are available at no charge for the district.
The link and information to login is located in the quick links on the website. To access quick links use the scroll bar under the picture and select quick links.

a.title: Go to comments for HCPS Access To Online Ebooks

span.p: As of April 1, 2020, HCPS transferred to a Facebook Group: Join us - Highland County Public Schools https://www.facebook.com/groups/HighlandCountyPublicSchools/

a.title: Go to comments for HCPS Facebook Group
